item.title: Aliases with global using directives
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop With the introduction of global usings in C#10, it is now also possible to defined a global alias to have a shortcut to a specific type, across an entire project. Global usings A quick intro to global usings - In C#10 the concept of global usings was introduced. It allows for a using statement to be prefixed with global, which then includes that using in all files automatically when compiled.
